branchCategory.name: LEY, Electric Actuator, Rod Type
branchCategory.description: The LEY rod type electric actuator has a familiar rod cylinder form suitable for push, pull, lift and press applications. The 24VDC motor can be reverse mounted for compact length, or inline mounted for compact height. The LEY series offers a wide variety of actuator mounting options as well, including numerous direct and bracket styles.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 16, 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg (horizontal); 53 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 1058 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 500 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor types: high load step motor or high speed servo motor</LI></UL>
